page.title: 08Social Services-Medbourne
page.content: There is no resident doctor in Medbourne but a group practice based in Kibworth, eight miles away, have a surgery in a local house two mornings a week. There is also a group practice at Market Harborough and Corby about the same distance away. Most people use Market Harborough for optical services, dentists and chemists. Two members of the Women's Institute fetch prescriptions for anyone without transport. The District Nurse, Health Visitor and home helps call in the area when needed and transport is provided to take the elderly to a chirodist in Market Harborough every two months. Meals on Wheels are prepared in Market Harborough and delivered but this service is currently little used.
